questions.describe: Where do you select the "Marketing User" checkbox to enable a user to create, edit, delete, and clone campaigns; manage campaign members; and edit advanced campaign setup?

AW Computing wants to run advertisement campaigns and then run reports to measure which advertisement type (online, magazine, or newspaper) generates the most revenue. Where would you create an "Advertisement Type" picklist to track this information?
Forecasting is an exact science and is the total of all the opportunities you are working on.

answerOptions.describe: Benchmark of how much should be sold within a certain time frame
Revenue projection that can be expressed in dollar amounts, units of product family, or both
Consists of opportunities in various stages of maturity
Benchmark of how much should be sold within a certain time frame
Revenue projection that can be expressed in dollar amounts, units of product family, or both
Consists of opportunities in various stages of maturity

Revenue projection that can be expressed in dollar amounts, units of product family, or both

questions.describe: Which of the following statements are true about an end user's forecast? (4 opt)

answerOptions.describe: Is updated in the system every evening at 5 pm
This aggregate can be dollars of revenue
This aggregate can be units of products
This aggregate can be both dollars or revenue and units of products
Rolls up according to the forecast hierarchy

questions.describe: Customizable Forecasting must be enabled by salesforce.com support.
Standard fiscal years must start on January 1st.
With Customizable Forecasting you can forecast any of the following data. (3 opt)
The Forecast Category on the Opportunity record maps directly, on a one-to-one basis, to the aggregates on the Forecast tab.
Which of the following statements are true about the Opportunity field, "Stage"? (2 opt)

answerOptions.describe: There are 10 default stage values, based on a commonly used sales methodology.
The list of default stage values cannot be edited or added.
There are other sales methodologies that can be downloaded from the AppExchange and used within Salesforce

questions.describe: Sales Rep Phil Smith has an opportunity for $50,000 in the Commit stage. Which aggregates on Phil's forecast will include this amount? (3 opt)
Which of the following describes the Stage field?

answerOptions.describe: Identifies where a deal is in relation to actually being closed.
Determines the row in your Forecast where the amount will be aggregated.
The numeric prediction that the revenue from an opportunity will be realized.

questions.describe: Which of the following describes the Probability field?

answerOptions.describe: Identifies where a deal is in relation to actually being closed.
Determines the row in your Forecast where the amount will be aggregated.
The numeric prediction that the revenue from an opportunity will be realized.
